overview: A re-examination of the unsolved case of the murders of the Al-Hilli family and Sylvain Mollier, in Chevaline on the 5th of September 2012. With the use of archive footage and interviews with victims' friends and family, and those close to the investigation in France and the UK, revisiting the police investigation, contemporary media reporting and exploring a variety of theories that arose to explain it.
title: Murder in the Alps
